trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around May 30th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsHeaded out around 11 pm to walk to local fuel station to buy milk.Instantley observed a bright orange light in the sky , a little too low to be commercial aircraft but too high to be anything else.It seemed to glow and burn, was visible for about a minute before went behind cloud cover.It seemed stationary but could have been moving at slow speed towards east
Summary: at 11 pm taking walk to fuel station noticed what look like firball in the sky about height of commercial airline
